segments.text: I'm trying to understand the woman's mindset in all of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's focused entirely on that plate, drying it with such dedication.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost admirable, her singular concentration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I look down, and her foot is literally standing in a growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can anyone be so utterly detached from their immediate environment?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is probably ice cold, yet she doesn't flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bizarre form of domestic zen, surrounded by impending ruin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those poor cabinet doors are being drenched, I can only imagine the damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children are so brazen with their cookie raid!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her serene expression really emphasizes the irony of the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish she would just look up, just for a second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A simple glance would reveal the entire mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is a masterclass in unintentional dramatic irony.
segments.speaker: PAR
